message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go lower than $130.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still not convinced that $130 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to pay $115 for it, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
